    • Method Detail

      • call

        public rx.Observable<RESULT> call(rx.Observable<LEFT_VALUE> leftObservable)
        Calls the Transformer. Breakdown of the flow: 1. Left side observable is buffered by the keying function 2. Right side observable is buffered by the keying function 3. An ordered zip is applied on each streams of buffers 3.a. Streams are processed according to the cross product function, which preserves SQL functionality 4. The results of this are flattened back into an Observable of RESULTs
        Specified by:
        call in interface rx.functions.Func1<rx.Observable<LEFT_VALUE>,rx.Observable<RESULT>>
        Parameters:
        leftObservable -
        Returns:

      • bufferedKeyFunction

        public static <VALUE,KEY> rx.functions.Func1<java.util.List<VALUE>,KEY> bufferedKeyFunction(rx.functions.Func1<? super VALUE,KEY> innerKeyFunction)
        Transforms a function which applies on a single element of VALUE to a function which applies on the first element of a list of VALUEs.
        Parameters:
        innerKeyFunction - the function to be applied to the first element
        Returns:
        the key value of the function result

      • crossProductJoinFunction

        public static <LEFT_VALUE,RIGHT_VALUE,RESULT> rx.functions.Func2<java.util.List<LEFT_VALUE>,java.util.List<RIGHT_VALUE>,rx.Observable<RESULT>> crossProductJoinFunction(rx.functions.Func2<LEFT_VALUE,RIGHT_VALUE,RESULT> joinFunction,
                                                                                                                                                                        JoinType joinType)
        Returns a function which, given two lists of values, returns an Observable of their cross product. Depending on the join type, null left or right side values are permitted; see JoinType for more details.
        Parameters:
        joinFunction - the function to apply the product between the two lists
        joinType - the type of join being applied
        Returns:
        a function which operates on list of left values, lists of right values, and returns an Observable of the result
